originalText.text:
I would not recommend this place. I waited over 2 hours in spite of an appt. I saw other people that came later than me that got to see the DDS sooner than me. The lobby chairs were filthy.

The filling I got here had to get replaced.

text.text:
I would not recommend this place. I waited over 2 hours in spite of an appt. I saw other people that came later than me that got to see the DDS sooner than me. The lobby chairs were filthy.

The filling I got here had to get replaced.

originalText.text: It was my first visit there ,Place was clean and good , everyone was friendly . I was there to remove my wisdom tooth, my tooth was so difficult to come out it take around 45 min but My doctor was so kind to me she keep trying and trying and finally She did it . I recommend this place to visit , I love the service they gave to me .
